meta.description: 100 patents relevant to cognition, cognitive computing, and AI reasoning â€” structured for formalization into Lean 4 proof terms

patents.title: Attention-based sequence transduction neural networks
patents.abstract: Multi-head self-attention mechanism for sequence-to-sequence transduction without recurrence or convolution.

patents.title: Neural network for cognitive state classification
patents.abstract: System classifying cognitive states from multimodal sensor inputs using deep neural architectures.

patents.title: Cognitive memory network with episodic retrieval
patents.abstract: Architecture implementing episodic memory retrieval via attention-gated addressing over external memory banks.

patents.title: System for commonsense reasoning using knowledge graphs
patents.abstract: Graph-based commonsense reasoning engine integrating structured knowledge with neural inference.

patents.title: Brain-computer interface signal decoding via deep learning
patents.abstract: Neural signal decoding pipeline translating cortical spike trains into motor intent using temporal convolution.

patents.title: Hierarchical reinforcement learning for cognitive task planning
patents.abstract: Hierarchical policy decomposition for long-horizon cognitive task planning with sub-goal discovery.

patents.title: Cognitive computing system with natural language understanding
patents.abstract: Cognitive system parsing natural language into structured semantic representations for question answering.

patents.title: Transformer architecture with sparse attention patterns
patents.abstract: Sparse attention patterns reducing quadratic complexity while preserving representational capacity.

patents.title: Metacognitive monitoring in artificial neural systems
patents.abstract: System enabling neural networks to estimate their own prediction confidence and trigger re-evaluation.

patents.title: Neural architecture search via cognitive complexity metrics
patents.abstract: Automated architecture search constrained by cognitive complexity metrics approximating human reasoning effort.

patents.title: Working memory augmented neural networks
patents.abstract: Neural network augmented with differentiable external working memory for algorithmic reasoning tasks.

patents.title: Causal inference engine for cognitive systems
patents.abstract: Engine performing causal inference from observational data using structural causal models and do-calculus.

patents.title: Analogical reasoning in neural-symbolic systems
patents.abstract: Hybrid system performing analogical reasoning by mapping structural relations between neural embeddings.

patents.title: Cognitive load estimation from physiological signals
patents.abstract: Real-time cognitive load estimation using EEG, pupilometry, and galvanic skin response fusion.

patents.title: Graph neural networks for abstract reasoning
patents.abstract: Graph neural network performing abstract visual reasoning over relational structures in perception tasks.

patents.title: Embodied cognitive agent with sensorimotor integration
patents.abstract: Embodied agent integrating sensorimotor feedback loops with cognitive planning modules for adaptive behavior.

patents.title: Neuro-symbolic program synthesis for cognitive tasks
patents.abstract: Synthesizing interpretable programs from neural perception modules guided by symbolic type constraints.

patents.title: Continual learning without catastrophic forgetting
patents.abstract: Elastic weight consolidation preventing catastrophic forgetting during sequential cognitive task acquisition.

patents.title: Bayesian theory of mind for multi-agent systems
patents.abstract: Bayesian model inferring beliefs, desires, and intentions of other agents from observed behavior.

patents.title: Self-supervised contrastive learning of cognitive representations
patents.abstract: Self-supervised framework learning cognitive representations via contrastive objectives without labeled data.

patents.title: Predictive coding in hierarchical neural architectures
patents.abstract: Hierarchical architecture implementing predictive coding with top-down predictions and bottom-up error signals.

patents.title: Attention-based cognitive map for spatial reasoning
patents.abstract: Neural cognitive map using attention for spatial reasoning and navigation in partially observed environments.

patents.title: Dynamic neural network routing for cognitive specialization
patents.abstract: Mixture-of-experts routing dynamically activating specialized cognitive sub-networks based on input type.

patents.title: Emotion recognition via multimodal cognitive fusion
patents.abstract: Multimodal system recognizing emotional states by fusing facial, vocal, and linguistic cognitive cues.

patents.title: Cognitive task decomposition via recursive neural planning
patents.abstract: Recursive decomposition of complex cognitive tasks into executable sub-plans with dependency ordering.

patents.title: Spiking neural network for temporal cognition
patents.abstract: Spiking neural network architecture encoding temporal cognitive patterns via precise spike timing.

patents.title: Cognitive dialogue system with persona grounding
patents.abstract: Dialogue system maintaining consistent cognitive persona via grounded memory and personality embeddings.

patents.title: Concept formation via prototype-based neural clustering
patents.abstract: Neural system forming concepts through prototype-based clustering in learned representation space.

patents.title: Compositional generalization in neural semantic parsing
patents.abstract: Neural parser achieving systematic compositional generalization by disentangling syntax from semantics.

patents.title: Curiosity-driven exploration via intrinsic motivation
patents.abstract: Exploration policy driven by prediction error as intrinsic reward signal for cognitive development.

patents.title: Cognitive digital twin for human decision modeling
patents.abstract: Digital twin modeling individual human cognitive decision patterns for prediction and assistance.

patents.title: Relational reasoning over visual scenes
patents.abstract: Neural module performing relational reasoning over object representations extracted from visual scenes.

patents.title: Federated learning of cognitive models with differential privacy
patents.abstract: Distributed training of cognitive models across devices with formal differential privacy guarantees.

patents.title: Inductive logic programming for cognitive rule extraction
patents.abstract: System extracting logical rules from neural network behavior via differentiable inductive logic programming.

patents.title: Vision-language cognitive grounding with transformers
patents.abstract: Transformer grounding language expressions in visual scenes for cognitive visual question answering.

patents.title: Cognitive error detection and self-correction in AI systems
patents.abstract: System detecting its own reasoning errors via internal consistency checks and triggering self-correction.

patents.title: Neural theorem proving with cognitive search heuristics
patents.abstract: Neural-guided theorem prover using learned cognitive heuristics to prioritize proof search.

patents.title: Cognitive speech recognition with contextual adaptation
patents.abstract: Speech recognition system adapting to cognitive context including topic, speaker state, and environment.

patents.title: Abstract visual reasoning via disentangled representations
patents.abstract: Disentangled representation learning enabling abstract visual reasoning on Raven-style progressive matrices.

patents.title: Knowledge distillation for cognitive model compression
patents.abstract: Distilling cognitive capabilities from large models into compact student models preserving reasoning quality.

patents.title: Schema-guided cognitive dialogue state tracking
patents.abstract: Dialogue state tracker using schema descriptions to generalize cognitive understanding across new domains.

patents.title: Moral reasoning module for autonomous cognitive agents
patents.abstract: Module evaluating actions against ethical frameworks for moral reasoning in autonomous cognitive agents.

patents.title: Counterfactual reasoning in cognitive neural networks
patents.abstract: Neural architecture generating and evaluating counterfactual scenarios for causal cognitive reasoning.

patents.title: Cognitive process automation with intent understanding
patents.abstract: Automation system understanding user intent from natural language and mapping to cognitive process workflows.

patents.title: Temporal difference learning for cognitive value estimation
patents.abstract: Temporal difference learning algorithm estimating cognitive value functions for sequential decision-making.

patents.title: Cognitive document understanding via layout-aware transformers
patents.abstract: Transformer model understanding document cognition through joint modeling of text content and spatial layout.

patents.title: Attention control in cognitive robotic systems
patents.abstract: Cognitive attention control system for robotic platforms prioritizing sensory processing based on task relevance.

patents.title: Few-shot cognitive task adaptation via meta-learning
patents.abstract: Meta-learning system enabling rapid cognitive task adaptation from few demonstrations via learned initialization.

patents.title: Neural cognitive architecture with global workspace theory
patents.abstract: Neural architecture implementing global workspace theory for conscious-like information integration.

patents.title: Cognitive anomaly detection via autoencoder reconstruction
patents.abstract: Autoencoder detecting cognitive system anomalies via reconstruction error thresholding on behavioral patterns.

patents.title: Cognitive question generation for educational systems
patents.abstract: System generating cognitively calibrated questions adapted to learner knowledge state and difficulty level.

patents.title: Differentiable neural computer with cognitive read-write heads
patents.abstract: Differentiable neural computer using learned read-write operations over external memory for cognitive tasks.

patents.title: Cognitive bias detection in decision support systems
patents.abstract: System detecting cognitive biases in human decision-making and providing debiased recommendations.

patents.title: Compositional concept learning via neural program induction
patents.abstract: Learning compositional concepts by inducing neural programs that capture structural regularities.

patents.title: Cognitive speech synthesis with prosodic modeling
patents.abstract: Speech synthesis system modeling cognitive prosodic patterns including emphasis, rhythm, and intonation.

patents.title: Multi-agent cognitive collaboration via communication protocols
patents.abstract: Multi-agent system developing emergent communication protocols for collaborative cognitive task solving.

patents.title: Cognitive intent prediction from gaze and gesture patterns
patents.abstract: Predicting user cognitive intent from gaze trajectory and gesture patterns in mixed reality environments.

patents.title: Symbolic regression via neural-guided search
patents.abstract: Discovering symbolic mathematical expressions from data using neural network guided search over expression trees.

patents.title: Cognitive recommendation with explicit reasoning chains
patents.abstract: Recommendation system providing explicit cognitive reasoning chains explaining why items are suggested.

patents.title: Spatial-temporal graph networks for cognitive event detection
patents.abstract: Graph network processing spatial-temporal data for detecting cognitive events in video streams.

patents.title: Language model cognitive alignment via human feedback
patents.abstract: Training language models to align with human cognitive preferences via reinforcement learning from feedback.

patents.title: Neural cognitive map for relational database querying
patents.abstract: Neural system mapping natural language to SQL queries using cognitive semantic parsing and schema linking.

patents.title: Cognitive fatigue prediction via wearable sensor fusion
patents.abstract: Predicting cognitive fatigue from wearable sensor data including heart rate variability and activity patterns.

patents.title: Object-centric representation learning for cognitive perception
patents.abstract: Unsupervised learning of object-centric representations decomposing visual scenes into cognitive entities.

patents.title: Cognitive code generation from natural language specifications
patents.abstract: System generating executable code from natural language cognitive specifications using neural program synthesis.

patents.title: Neuromorphic cognitive processor with on-chip learning
patents.abstract: Neuromorphic processor implementing cognitive functions with spike-based on-chip learning for edge inference.

patents.title: Cognitive scene understanding via neural radiance fields
patents.abstract: Neural radiance field approach to cognitive 3D scene understanding from sparse 2D observations.

patents.title: Cognitive skill transfer across task domains
patents.abstract: Transfer learning framework enabling cognitive skill transfer from source to target task domains.

patents.title: Probabilistic cognitive model for uncertainty quantification
patents.abstract: Bayesian deep learning model quantifying epistemic and aleatoric uncertainty in cognitive predictions.

patents.title: Cognitive image captioning with attention visualization
patents.abstract: Image captioning model with cognitive attention visualization showing which regions influence generated words.

patents.title: Cognitive debugging via program state reasoning
patents.abstract: AI system performing cognitive debugging by reasoning over program states and identifying fault localizations.

patents.title: Self-organizing cognitive memory for lifelong learning
patents.abstract: Self-organizing memory system supporting lifelong cognitive learning with dynamic capacity allocation.

patents.title: Cognitive graph reasoning for multi-hop question answering
patents.abstract: Graph-based cognitive reasoning performing multi-hop inference chains for complex question answering.

patents.title: Cognitive simulation of physical dynamics via learned models
patents.abstract: Learned physics simulator performing cognitive simulation of physical dynamics for planning and prediction.

patents.title: Cognitive privacy-preserving computation via secure enclaves
patents.abstract: Secure enclave architecture for privacy-preserving cognitive computation on sensitive data.

patents.title: Hierarchical cognitive planning via world models
patents.abstract: World model enabling hierarchical cognitive planning by simulating future states at multiple abstraction levels.

patents.title: Cognitive anomaly explanation via contrastive reasoning
patents.abstract: Explaining detected anomalies by generating contrastive cognitive explanations comparing normal and anomalous states.

patents.title: Cognitive data augmentation via generative models
patents.abstract: Generative model producing cognitively consistent synthetic training data for data-scarce cognitive tasks.

patents.title: Cognitive network intrusion detection via behavioral analysis
patents.abstract: Network intrusion detection using cognitive behavioral analysis to identify anomalous access patterns.

patents.title: Cognitive text summarization with faithfulness constraints
patents.abstract: Abstractive summarization with cognitive faithfulness constraints ensuring factual consistency with source.

patents.title: Cognitive active learning for efficient annotation
patents.abstract: Active learning system selecting maximally informative samples using cognitive uncertainty-based acquisition.

patents.title: Cognitive molecular property prediction via graph transformers
patents.abstract: Graph transformer predicting molecular properties by cognitive reasoning over atomic structure graphs.

patents.title: Cognitive architecture for autonomous vehicle decision-making
patents.abstract: Cognitive decision architecture for autonomous vehicles integrating perception, prediction, and planning.

patents.title: Cognitive retrieval-augmented generation for knowledge tasks
patents.abstract: Generation model augmented with cognitive retrieval from external knowledge stores for factual grounding.

patents.title: Cognitive fingerprint authentication via behavioral biometrics
patents.abstract: Authentication system using cognitive behavioral biometrics including typing dynamics and device interaction.

patents.title: Cognitive neural ODE for continuous-time dynamics modeling
patents.abstract: Neural ordinary differential equation modeling continuous-time cognitive dynamics with adaptive step size.

patents.title: Cognitive visual grounding in 3D environments
patents.abstract: System grounding natural language expressions to 3D spatial regions using cognitive visual-linguistic reasoning.

patents.title: Cognitive time-series forecasting with attention mechanisms
patents.abstract: Attention-based model for cognitive time-series forecasting capturing multi-scale temporal dependencies.

patents.title: Cognitive game playing via Monte Carlo tree search with neural evaluation
patents.abstract: Game playing system combining Monte Carlo tree search with neural cognitive evaluation for strategic planning.

patents.title: Cognitive protein structure prediction via attention over residues
patents.abstract: Attention-based architecture predicting 3D protein structure from amino acid sequences via iterative refinement.

patents.title: Cognitive sentiment analysis with aspect-level granularity
patents.abstract: Fine-grained sentiment analysis identifying cognitive sentiment toward specific aspects of reviewed entities.

patents.title: Cognitive adversarial robustness via certified defenses
patents.abstract: Certified defense providing provable robustness guarantees for cognitive neural networks under adversarial perturbation.

patents.title: Cognitive image generation via diffusion processes
patents.abstract: Diffusion-based model generating cognitively coherent images through iterative denoising process.

patents.title: Cognitive medical diagnosis via symptom graph reasoning
patents.abstract: Medical diagnosis system performing cognitive reasoning over symptom-disease graphs with uncertainty quantification.

patents.title: Cognitive gesture recognition for sign language translation
patents.abstract: System recognizing cognitive gestures in sign language and translating them to natural language text.

patents.title: Cognitive graph generation for drug discovery
patents.abstract: Generative model producing novel molecular graphs with desired cognitive-pharmacological properties.

patents.title: Cognitive robotics with affordance prediction
patents.abstract: Robotic system predicting object affordances for cognitive manipulation planning in unstructured environments.

patents.title: Cognitive network embedding via hyperbolic geometry
patents.abstract: Embedding cognitive hierarchical structures in hyperbolic space preserving tree-like relational properties.

patents.title: Cognitive music generation with structural coherence
patents.abstract: Music generation system maintaining long-range cognitive structural coherence via hierarchical sequence modeling.
